<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection/><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Calculate fine</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Assuming this script is executed within a Business Rule or Script Include context

    // Check if current object is defined and not null
    if (current && current.isValid()) {
        // Retrieve days_late field from current record
        var daysLate = current.days_late;

        // Check if daysLate is a valid number and greater than 0
        if (!isNaN(daysLate) && daysLate > 0) {
            // Retrieve fine rate per day from system property
            var fineRatePerDayStr = gs.getProperty('com.example.fine_rate_per_day');
            var fineRatePerDay = parseFloat(fineRatePerDayStr);

            // Check if fineRatePerDay is a valid number
            if (!isNaN(fineRatePerDay)) {
                // Calculate fine amount
                var fineAmount = daysLate * fineRatePerDay;

                // Set fine_amount field on current record
                current.fine_amount = fineAmount;
                current.update(); // Save the record with calculated fine_amount

                // Log success message
                gs.info('Fine amount calculated and set: ' + fineAmount);
            } else {
                // Handle invalid fine rate per day
                gs.warn('Invalid value for fineRatePerDay: ' + fineRatePerDayStr);
            }
        } else {
            // Handle invalid or non-positive daysLate
            gs.warn('Invalid or non-positive value for daysLate: ' + daysLate);
        }
    } else {
        // Handle case where current is not defined or not a valid GlideRecord
        gs.warn('Invalid or null current object: ' + current);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harini.srija</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-03 12:48:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ad87677b93310210ef267c5efaba10ab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate fine</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BookQuest" source="x_1383151_bkquest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BookQuest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ad87677b93310210ef267c5efaba10ab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harini.srija</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-03 13:20:53</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ad87677b93310210ef267c5efaba10ab"/></record_update>
